title: Two Bedroom, Two Bathroom in Ballard with Balcony!
posting_body: Hang with your friends and neighbors around the fire pit!
Get a work-out in at our Fully Equipped Fitness Center or recharge after a long day in our tranquil landscaped outdoor courtyard.
Truly pet friendly, we welcome your animals like family!
Located in between the Gilman Playground Park and the Ballard Market.
Follow This Link for More Information:
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 904 Sq.
- Rooftop deck w/ views & Wi-Fi access
- Extra Storage closets starting at $95 per month
- Reserved, garage parking space for $160 monthly
- Courtyard with massive gas fire pit
- 24 hour fitness center with State of the art cardio studio and Strength training equipment
- Package Concierge Lockers for 24 hour access
- Fantastic Coffee Machine w/ espresso, hot cocoa and more!
- Resident Website w/ Online Bill Pay, Work Orders and more
KOI treats your pets are a part of the family, with complimentary MudBay treats at the office every day!
Restricted Breeds: Pit Bull Terriers/Staffordshire Terriers, Rottweiler's, Doberman Pinschers, Chows, Presa Canarios, Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, Wolf-Hybrids
Please contact our leasing professionals for more information.
Applicant's gross income must be 3 times the monthly rent.
Must have 5x the monthly rent as income and good credit.

Ideal Ballard location provides commuters with instant connectivity to the best of Seattle, and offers residents easy access to bus routes, Interstate 5, Route 99 as well as local shopping, restaurants and entertainment venues.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
